# useMaybeRoomContext

Returns the room context if it exists, otherwise undefined.

## Import

```typescript
import { useMaybeRoomContext } from "@livekit/components-react";
```

{% partial file="p_usage.md" variables={exampleCount: 0} /%}

## Returns

```typescript
Room | undefined;
```
